1.title: Turbo
1.description: A subscriber of Twitch's monthly premium user service

message.body: i sure hope not
there probably is once you have the feather but uh yeah
best cloud
tbf, the clip sucks with yoshi in this situation
probably the springboard not being at max fall speed?
well rip then
bad subpixel then
it's always bad subpixels
I enjoy how you always put it in slot 1 even though 3 is perfectly fine
you don't even need fish for slot 3 if you do it right
you could learn the intended strat for this part too tbh
incoming "no" - hf
it's as important as the brown block wall at the start of this room
or well, closer to the middle i guess
lol
the joke was that I remove it
LUL
it didn't, removing those takes basically 0 effort
I considered removing it several times but then it would look different and :(
but then two weeks ago I recorded a new movie for the new version of this room, did exactly that, forget to remove it, and then I removed it from lm
and also replayed the entire room
worrying
SabaPing
could be better
rust is being annoying
I have a project that builds fine in both release and debug but crashes at runtime but only in debug
and release sucks because a) rust compile times are extremely slow and b) I need debug to, well, debug stuff
release takes like 5 minutes to compile a change, ~10 if I compile from scratch
oh yeah, also this debug crash started happening on some update on rustc, I used to just downgrade the compiler to use an older rustc but that somehow also stopped working and ?????
PogChamp
from what I can tell it doesn't even crash within the codebase, it crashes on some rust trait which is fun
but oh well
i believe this state should be fine
also, @your idea, I think it would actually fail even earlier than you think so I'd almost like you to try it just to see if what I think would happen actually happens
fair, the thing that I think would fail is the eat cancel part specifically
are ya winning son?
Hi HF, didnt know you streamed.
What is this tool called?
hm, that's not exactly what I expected
Ok
well, I expected the feather to still be stuck on the ground and not start moving because it's inside the spikes
good game
yeah, that's the part I wasn't expecting
alright, well as long as it's grounded while on the tongue then this won't break other stuff but now I'm a little more concerned
oh no
that's not good
this game sucks why are we playing this
you aren't even supposed to do this clip with yoshi
no, you can, it doesn't change anything, just makes it harder
probably was the moving spike, it just despawned before it reached yoshi's mouth
now just keep 3 fish alive during the whole ordeal and you're done
after seeing the feather fall down there, I'd say there's a pretty good chance you're going to break the level
I don't.
oh no
I just had an awful idea to fix this which involves a break that is really stupid but might be possible
and if it is possible then that's also kinda concerning for the rest of the level
you could loop the mushroom, dunno which is worse
well not in this state but you can stun the lightning later
yes, I didn't say it was a good solution
there isn't even a good way of fixing that
meh
i guess the best way would be to get rid of the second mushroom but I'm not sure how to do that
make the offscreen tongue do weird stuff and maybe get it like that?
if you can get an offscreen tongue from this
but what do you do if you lose it?
also, there are spikes even closer
at the filter
very top of the level
sure why not
well, in theory you can get two mushrooms by looping so you could just cheat them now and try it anyway
just to see if i have to concern myself with it
wait
what were you thinking I meant when I suggested that earlier?
how would you not get two from that
just loop mushroom, stun later
ah well, i meant the state you were trying to get to with what were trying right now
yes yes i get, I still consider that state to be two mushrooms
okay well that solves one problem
go figure out the intended solution so I can tell you my idea for the stupid break
which actually, I don't think works in practice now that I tried going through what you'd need but
okay nvm I think an alternative, potentially even worse version, does work, rip
i'd say blind but knowing the solution makes me pretty biased
you could go through the assumptions you made last time, one of those should have changed with the new layout
rr
back what did i miss
good
well, I can tell you that the wrong one from last time is corrected, and that you made a new wrong one lol
I have, in fact, beaten this version so chances are it's possible
well, uh, think about that last assumption you made more?
you're really just missing one small detail
what's the state of mario in your hypothetical scenario?
where
i see
well don't be left
probably
inb4 it's a break
intended solution does all the setup while it's falling, which takes about 3 minutes
slo mo cape sounds twallGasm
hi hf gl
i don't like how close that is
of course
7E0DAE80
you could've seen that quite a bit earlier lol
fair
it's a glitch that you've used in various forms in this hack already
cool, I made some changes now release doesn't compile anymore
but debug still does but it crashes there
i hate rust
nvm I ran the wrong script which installed an ancient version of rustc
gg
now if you juggle at the end you can smuggle an additional mushroom in here
which completely breaks this
you can do the third exit
you had a mushroom in the box when you grew
you could carry that all the way over to the left and keep one in the box at the end
(i'm not saying you should, but)
i don't think i'll care about that though
now for my break idea: I think you can do the entire room without having a mushroom in your item box
by doing the double tongue next to the spike at the filter
it'd probably be hell but I think it should be possible
so in the savestate you have, you could double tongue using the yoshi grow animation at the ledge top left of that state
yes
if you get everything to the ledge where the filter is
and then just do a double tongue in a way so that the invisible yoshi runs to the left
then you have the sumo brother, invisible yoshi on the left, grown yoshi on the right and are still big
which is all you'd need
yes
idk, i figured that'd be the easiest part
oh yeah this break is absolutely the worst
but it'd skip the entire need for the mushroom section and all of the setup involved with it
you were in possession of a fish
yes you do because you need to cancel it's tongue
mhm
the thing that makes this much worse is that you have to get the invisible yoshi to run to the left as well
ah, right, yoshi timers, fun
honestly, this is already very close to working and I don't think I like that
I expected it to be a bit worse
you can also do the whole thing with the springboard and get rid of this fish problem
i did and uh, not a fan
now i feel like i should do something about it
and i don't know what
yeah...., that was the thing that made me come up with this in the first place
because that would solve the whole 'you have a reserve item' problem the other potential breaks had
but also, this is terrible and I don't really want to require it
especially because it also means that you can't do the stun early and you will have to wait 3 minutes, no matter what
and the whole thing was designed so you don't have to do that
yeah that's not the issue I'm concerned about
hm
the window in which you can do it is actually pretty lenient
you can still get it at ~ -22000
yeah, i don't know. I kinda care about the 3 minutes, or at least having the option, it was always the intention to have both options available and valid
and I'm also not really a fan of the stun yet either, would have to try it myself
I do agree with the second mushroom being unneeded and uninteresting
ideally I would want to remove it but also keep the option to do the stun early
especially because the reserve item introduces potential breaks
yeah that too
leaves the question of what to use to feed yoshi
after getting the mushroom and stunning the spike
yes, that
again, ideally i would want the reserve item to be gone without having to sacrifice the 3 minutes and doing this stun
there isn't exactly much interesting stuff you can do with just a mushroom though
of course, I could put a feeding spot you can only access with a mushroom, that'd solve it but making that interesting is probably difficult
yeah, i just don't know how to feel about it, haven't done it myself yet
in theory it's probably more interesting than feeding the yoshi, in practice, I'm not a big fan of weird stun setups
lol
well, another thing is that i'd want to do it with a springboard, I think that solves most the issues you had
but also then i need a way to get the springboard up there legitematly
well, you see, doing a yoshi springboard eat above a pit of lava, was, in fact, not part of the intended way to reach the end of this room
but yeah, i guess that's easily solved
glad we're on the same page then
great
i'd probably just place some blocks there to get up
ah yes, I love climbing vines with my yoshi
or well, i guess you don't need to
yeah uh no
gotta keep the lava cutoff though
well
idk, vine would be fine i suppose
why not
and don't tell me about the single tile ceiling
ah right
yeah, that's probably why that was there in the first place
not that i remember what I was thinking a year ago
makes sense
idk
yeah, even the intended alternative stun wouldn't have to use it so it'd be extra there too
or actually, maybe it would need it
yeah nvm
man, decisions suck
how do people do that
i mean the intended alternate stun, not the stun you just did
thanks for adjusting the ground to better fit the rest of the level
move the noteblocks up by one then sure
or two
man, this decision will delay the release of the hack by at least a year at this rate
yeah, it's really good
glad it does
it actually isn't useless, it prevents the feather from despawning
but it could also be cement so
because if you tongue it and the tongue puts it on an air block then the feather will actually start falling
which means it can despawn while on the tongue and then you can dupe it
same reason why there are clouds below the spikes now
and also the reason why i expected it to stay still when you cancelled the tongue but i guess that didn't happen
remember when you gave me a savestate of you duping the feather? well it turns out it was duped because there wasn't a block to the left of the feather
that's the week where that block got added
i mean, will there though
you still did the intended solution even if that change is made
not that I don't want you to play it but i wasn't exactly expecting it
I suppose
well, I will have to see what I do with it
I'll definitely have to consider it, it seems like it's the safest option at this point
I'm just not happy coming to terms with it yet
we'll see
in the meantime, you can go get the last exit you're missing
shouldn't take too long
yes, very important exit
it absolutely isn't but it annoys me every time i see the overworld that this section is still a questionmark LUL
it also changed a bit
i hope it still works lol
you used to get the mushroom a lot later for example, never tested that change
so much for "i remember the beginning at least"
lava cutoff, terrible hack
really wish there was a consistent setup for this as well
it can be kind of annoying at times
gotta love smw
it's what dacin did
i just use an invisible yoshi
gg
much better
well, if you are going to replay the second room next week then that'll probably not take the entire stream so there could fit a reznor there
i mean uh what
well I will have to see what to do about the room first anyway
o/
